author: Mir080
title: Enjoy your stay in Times Square!!!...
text:
The location is great!.. any time you come back at the hotel, you'll have fun by watching the high skyscrapers bombed with huge advertising!.. The red staircase in the night is simply more red!.. Invites everybody to take thousands pics!...
Room Tip: from the highest floor you have a great view! See more room tips
